select distinct A.InMat_Order_No, A.InMat_Lot_No, A.InMat_No, A.InMat_Code, C.Product_Item_Name InMat_Name, C.Product_Info_STND_1 InMat_STND_1, C.Product_Info_STND_2 InMat_STND_2, A.InMat_Qty, A.InMat_Unit_Price, D.Child_TBL_Type InMat_Unit, A.InMat_Price, A.InMat_Client_Code, B.Cus_Name InMat_Client_Name, A.InMat_Date, A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc, E.Child_TBL_Type InMat_Rcv_Clsfc_Name, F.Order_lInfo_Remark InMat_Info_Remark, A.inMat_dInsert_Time, A.inMat_Modifier, A.InMat_External_Lot_No, H.Child_TBL_Type InMat_Result from InMat_tbl A inner join Customer_tbl B on A.InMat_Client_Code = B.Cus_Code inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.InMat_Code = C.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL D on C.PRODUCT_UNIT = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL E on A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = E.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join OrderList_tbl F on A.InMat_Order_No = F.Order_lCus_No and A.InMat_Code = F.Order_lCode left outer join InMat_Inspect_tbl G ON A.InMat_Order_No = G.InMat_Inspect_Order_No AND A.InMat_Code = G.InMat_Inspect_ItemCode left outer join DTL_TBL H ON G.InMat_Inspect_Result = H.Child_TBL_No
where A.InMat_Date >= #{startDate} and A.InMat_Date < #{endDate}
and A.InMat_Code like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%') and A.InMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
and A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = #{ItemSendClsfc}
and C.Product_WRHSN_INSPC = 'true' and A.InMat_Check_1 = 'false'
and C.Product_WRHSN_INSPC = 'true' and A.InMat_Check_1 = 'true' and G.InMat_Inspect_Result is not null
and A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc != '207'
order by A.InMat_Date

SELECT A.InMat_Order_No, A.InMat_Lot_No, A.InMat_No, A.InMat_Code, C.Product_Item_Name InMat_Name, B.LM_Qty InMat_Qty, A.InMat_Unit_Price, C.Product_Info_STND_1 InMat_Item_Stnd_1, C.Product_Info_STND_2 InMat_Item_Stnd_2, A.InMat_Client_Code, D.Cus_Name InMat_Client_Name, A.InMat_Date, A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc, E.Child_TBL_Type InMat_Rcv_Clsfc_Name FROM InMat_tbl A inner join LotMaster_tbl B on A.InMat_Lot_No = B.LM_LotNo and B.LM_Qty > 0 inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.InMat_Code = C.Product_Item_Code inner join Customer_tbl D on A.InMat_Client_Code = D.Cus_Code inner join DTL_TBL E on A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc = E.Child_TBL_No where B.LM_WareHouse = (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 10 and Child_TBL_Type = '자재창고') and A.InMat_Rcv_Clsfc != (select Child_TBL_No from DTL_TBL where New_TBL_Code = 17 and Child_TBL_Type = '입고반품') and A.InMat_Code like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%') and A.InMat_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
